messages.subject: PS dances
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I have a question. My family lives in Tillamook County Oregon and my dd is 8 and my ds is 4. My niece is in ps and the sixth grade, she wants me to
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
I have a question. My family lives in Tillamook County Oregon and my
dd is 8 and my ds is 4. My niece is in ps and the sixth grade, she
wants me to chaperone one of her dances at the school. My children
have been invited by her too. I just don't know if that constitutes as
an extracurricular activity that the state can then make my dd take
yearly test or not. The dance isn't worth it to me, but the kids
really want to go. I love my niece and want to be included in her
activities. My niece is going to talk to her principal, I'm not sure
that is who to talk to about this. Help, I know alot of you are really
busy,but HELP!!
Crystle
